text:
In case you weren't already convinced, here's some more compelling evidence that the fixation with lip fillers and injectables has gone TOO FAR, here's a crazy new Botched preview. Botched really does bring the drama, you guys. Meet 27-year-old Jonathan Dylan, who's seeking out the services of stars Dr. Paul Nassif and Dr. Terry Dubrow on a new episode of the show. His lips are a big deal, but not big enough apparently...

This content is imported from YouTube. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

"Growing up I was always really obsessed with dolls," Dylan explains, and "I really wanted to look like that. So when I was 25 I started getting botox and fillers [and] I became obsessed with lip injection."

Dylan now has so much filler in his lips that he can't close his mouth completely, a condition the doctors call "lip incompetence." (Which I'm p. sure is also doctor code for, "you clearly don't understand what this is doing to you.") And that's not even plot twist! Dylan quickly learns that if he keeps up with his injections, his lips could LITERALLY FALL OFF. I wish I was joking. This is a thing that might actually happen.

Giphy

To make matters more complicated, Dylan has made a brand for himself off of his abnormally large lips. He refers to himself as a "Ken Doll" on Instagram, often hashtagging his own photos with #livingkendoll. But when there's a distinct possibility your lips will actually die, that should be a solid indication enough is enough!? Hopefully Dr. Nassif and Dr. Dubrow can talk some sense into him before all lip-hell breaks loose. Literally loose.

This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.
title: This Botched Patient's Lip Injections Are So Big He LITERALLY Can't Close His Mouth
